paragraphs.text: Palestine's wasted time at the UN.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: Even by the standards of the Israeli-Palestinian peace process, the Palestinian Authority's just-thwarted attempt at a UN Security Council resolution was a spectacular waste of time, and needlessly handed Israel a symbolic diplomatic victory
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The draft - which called for peace with Israel within a year, and an end to the occupation by 2017- fell one yes vote short of the minimum nine required in the 15-member Council
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Five countries abstained
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: two - the US and Australia - voted no
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Draft resolutions are usually preceded by consultations with Council members, so whoever submits them knows, beforehand, which way the vote will go
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This draft was no different
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In fact
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: insufficient support among Council members was the initial reason given months ago by the PA for a delay in the vote
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As such, it must have known prior to presenting the draft that it would fail
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: so
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: why go through with it?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In fact
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: why did the PA try to push through a resolution in the first place?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Even if
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it mustered the minimum votes
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: the US would have used its veto
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the PA knew it
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Not only have the Americans consistently scuppered any resolution that places even the slightest criticism or pressure on Israel
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Washington had been explicit about its intention to use its veto this time round if necessary
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As such, it is puzzling that Jordan's UN Ambassador Dina Kawar, whose country submitted the draft with the backing of the PA and the Arab League, said she thought Council members should have had more time to discuss the proposal
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: What would be the point in the face of an assured American veto?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The only way Washington would acquiesce was if the resolution called for an end to the Palestinian occupation of Israel
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This makes PA President Mahmoud Abbas's recent statement that he had repeatedly postponed the resolution due to US pressure equally puzzling
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Did he actually think anything he could say or do would lead to the US dropping such pressure, or that it would accept the draft that was presented?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In any case, months of consultations and various reasons for delays only resulted in the continued watering down of the text
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This led to widespread Palestinian condemnation, from the public and from every faction
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Among the most prominent critics is the widely popular senior Fatah figure Marwan Barghouti
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: whose party dominates the PA and includes Abbas
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Barghouti described the text as an "unjustified fallback which will adversely affect the Palestinian position"
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: Moreover
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the draft was not put forward as a Chapter VII resolution
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: which would entail punitive measures for lack of compliance
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As such
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: even if
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it was passed
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Israel - which flatly condemned the PA's push from the outset- would be free to ignore it without consequence
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: as it has done with all the numerous Security Council resolutions over the decades
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Indeed
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the draft did not contain any wording that would cause Israel to worry
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Given that the US veto shields Israel
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: that existing resolutions are ignored with impunity
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: it is astounding that the PA had any faith left in the Council to attempt its latest futile exercise at statehood
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Even
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the response of its UN Ambassador Riyad Mansour was telling in this regard
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: "The Security Council has once again failed to uphold its charter duties to address this crises and to meaningfully contribute to a lasting solution in accordance with its own resolutions."
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: It has long been clear that the UN is a highly unlikely place for Palestinians to seek justice
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: as
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the consistent wishes and support of the international community for their cause is held hostage by just one country
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The very notion of Security Council vetoes makes the UN an inherently and woefully undemocratic institution
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The irony is that in the case of Palestine, a democracy is to blame
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The US ambassador to the UN, Samantha Power, had the gall to say the resolution undermined efforts to "achieve two states for two people"
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: The entire point of the resolution was to create a state that the existing state is determined to deny
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As such, one wonders if she even read the draft
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It seems the mere mention of Israel automatically triggers an American veto
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This whole months-long affair was an obvious exercise in futility
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: during which time
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Israel has further entrenched its occupation and colonisation of Palestine
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The day after the resolution failed
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Abbas signed a document requesting membership of the International Criminal Court
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Given numerous previous threats to join the ICC, this is a welcome development
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: However
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: he should have done this the moment Palestine's upgraded status at the UN allowed it do so more than two years ago
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Amid Israel's relentless colonisation and occupation, and after more than 20 years of fruitless negotiations, the Palestinians do not have the luxury of waiting indefinitely for statehood
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As such, the PA must act with the necessary urgency and focus
paragraphs.label: assumption
